abstract: Letter from Costa Rica Ambassador Roman Macaya responds to December 21 editorial calling for repeal of 1966 Cuban Adjustment Act to stem effects Cuban exodus is having throughout Americas.
lead_paragraph: The ambassador of Costa Rica says his country is facing a “growing humanitarian and economic challenge” in caring for the Cubans.

headline.main: Costa Rica’s Worries About Flood of Cuban Migrants

snippet: The ambassador of Costa Rica says his country is facing a “growing humanitarian and economic challenge” in caring for the Cubans.
